name: Community Builder
description:
Community Builder is a simple and relaxing Isomeric puzzler where players get to grow trees, grow food, and place houses to grow the size of their community. There aren't many limitations to how you can build just have fun growing your beautiful community!

Tips:

  • Placing water is a must for trees and food to grow. Trees and food can detect water in adjacent tiles (above, below, left, or right). If there's no water near you will see a water symbol above the food/tree.
  • Houses require 1 wood to build.
  • After placing a house you can add a dweller if you have 1 food by clicking the house.
  • Houses have a max of 2 dwellers you can tell how many are currently living in a house with the hearts above the house.
  • After a tree is chopped or food is harvested it will grow back after some time as long as it has water next to it.

This project is for the Kenney game jam and was made in one day so please forgive any bugs or sloppiness you may encounter.
